data.title: Spanish LALIGA News, Stats, Scores
data.meta_description: Follow all the latest Spanish LALIGA football news, fixtures, stats, and more on ESPN.
data.text:
Sid Lowe

Photographer didn't believe in destiny, until he captured iconic Messi-Yamal image

Joan Monfort never believed in fate, until 16 years after a calendar shoot, he discovered he'd photographed football's GOAT bathing his heir apparent.

Adriana Garcia

Álvarez: I left City to look for a new challenge

Julián Álvarez has said he left Manchester City after only two seasons to join Atlético Madrid because he needed "a new challenge."

Sam Marsden and Moises Llorens

Olmo to miss Barça opener amid registration doubts

Barcelona coach Hansi Flick has said new signing Dani Olmo is not fit enough to take part in Saturday's LaLiga opener at Valencia amid ongoing doubts about when he will be registered with the league.

Adriana Garcia

Yamal's father recovering well after stabbing

Lamine Yamal's father, Mounir Nasraoui, said he is recovering well in hospital after being stabbed multiple times on Wednesday.

Reuters

Girona fight back to draw with Betis in LaLiga return

Girona substitute Gabriel Misehouy struck in the 72nd minute to rescue a 1-1 draw at Real Betis in their opening game of the new LaLiga season on Thursday.

ESPN

Arsenal to win the Premier League, Arne Slot to thrive at Liverpool? Bold predictions for 2024-25

The new season is upon us! What better time than now for some bold, spicy predictions for the 2024-25 European campaign? Our writers bring their hottest takes for the next nine months.

Adriana Garcia

Lamine Yamal's father stabbed in Spain; 4 arrested

The father of 17-year-old Barcelona and Spain star Lamine Yamal has been hospitalised after being stabbed in a parking lot near Barcelona, Spanish police have confirmed to ESPN.

ESPN

Transfer Talk: Barcelona eye move for France star Kanté

Barcelona are considering France midfielder N'Golo Kanté as a potential signing this summer. Transfer Talk has the latest.

ESPN

How to watch the 2024-25 LaLiga season opener on ESPN+

It's time for the 2024-2025 LaLiga season! Will Real Madrid repeat as champions? Here's how to watch the action on ESPN+.

Alex Kirkland, Rodrigo Faez

Mbappé scores in debut as Madrid win Super Cup

Kylian Mbappé scored in his debut after being named in Carlo Ancelotti's starting XI for Real Madrid's win over Atalanta in the UEFA Super Cup on Wednesday.

Alex Kirkland, Rodrigo Faez

Sources: Arsenal, Real Sociedad in Merino talks

Arsenal and Real Sociedad are accelerating talks over the transfer of Spain midfielder Mikel Merino to the Premier League club, sources have told ESPN.
